channel.title: Youtube banner?
channel.description:
Hey guys, i know this isn't related to moparscape, but i don't know where else to post it....
Anyway.... lots of us know Excl, the RS youtube vid maker.
Now, here is a picture of one of his videos:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/exclvid.png[/img]
Notice in the top left corner he has a banner saying (look it's a banner):
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/exclvid.png[/img]
Now here is a picture of one of my vids:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/thegoldfirst.png[/img]
in the top left corner it only shows my name....
How do i get my own little banner instead of my name?

item.title: Youtube banner?
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“Andrew Ferguson, post:2, topic:410045”]You need to be a YouTube partner, pretty easy to be one, here’s a video on it.

www.youtube.com/watch?v=LAFt7DR8X80&feature=related[/quote]Yeah its easy to get over 10k subs and over 1k views on each vid and make vids everyday? Good luck rifk.

Read full topic
